titleStmt.title: The Quakers remonstrance to the Parliament, &c. touching the popish plot and Sir Edmund-Bury Godfrey's murder much of which being not unseasonable at this juncture, it is now reprinted, as also to shew that the Quakers were formerly as zealous against popery as any others, notwithstanding they have so much appeared to the contrary of late.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
